alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 3:56AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Robeson, western Bladen, southwestern Brunswick, Columbus and Horry Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 355 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms roughly extending from near Fair Bluff to near Bayboro to near Nixonville. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Whiteville, Surfside Beach, Sunset Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Calabash, Bladenboro and Bethel. This includes the following highways... US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 13. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 5 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 5 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Northern Horry
